data.title: Phil Manzanera on AirPlay Direct
data.text:
Get your air guitar out with Phil Manzanera’s “Ritmo De Los Angeles”!

Phil Manzanera releases his new song “Ritmo De Los Angeles” from his album Primitive Guitars. The solely instrumental song definitely does not lack any lyrical elements as it is filled with a great electric guitar melody and a strong, syncopated bass. This song will definitely get you grooving. With 1970s rock elements that you would hear from Led Zeppelin, Phil Manzanera creates timeless music that comes from the soul. In Manzanera’s music, you can hear the Latin American influences that he grew up hearing and living.

Manzanera’s single “Ritmo De Los Angeles” is reminiscent of the rock god from the 70s and 80s. During a song, there comes the instrumental, where the rocker goes into his own world and creates amazing sounds. Phil Manzanera does this; however, not just in the ‘instrumental’, but throughout the entire song.

You can check out Phil Manzanera and the rest of his music at the following sites:

www.AirPlayDirect.com/philmanzanera

www.manzanera.com

www.allmusic.com/album/primitive-guitars-mw0000263023

www.myspace.com/firebirdv11

www.facebook.com/philmanzanera

ABOUT PHIL MANZANERA

Phil Manzanera is one of the UK’s best-known musicians and record producers, having shot to prominence in the early ‘70’s as the lead guitarist with Roxy Music. He is widely acknowledged as one of the world’s leading guitarists and is in much demand both as a performer and record producer. Recent productions include David Gilmour: Live in Gdansk as well as Gilmour’s chart topping, platinum- selling album, On An Island and Enrique Bunbury’s Hellville Deluxe which charted at no 1 in Mexico and Spain – the latter three albums all receiving Grammy nominations. He is currently producing Bebe, one of Spain’s hottest new female artists and already a Latino Grammy winner.
